summary: Add 6 types (90 variants at all) of stockings for CBBE v3 standart body.
descriptionHtml:
Add 6 types (90 variants at all) of stockings for CBBE v3 standart body.

You can find it all at Riverwood at Zlushka\'s Chest (see location screens). Or post in console \"help Zlushka 0\" and use command \"player.additem xxxxxxxx 1\", where \"xxxxxxxx\" is ItemID.

In Miscellaneous you can find photoshop file (.psd), 3ds max files (.max) and .obj with meshes.

Installation:
          Put Data directory from archive in to Skyrim folder (\"...\\The Elder Scrolls V - Skyrim\\...\"). 
          Check in Skyrim launcher File menu that DVd.esp is active.

Deinstallation:
         Delete (or deactive in Skyrim launcher File menu) DVd.esp.
         Delete folder \"...\\The Elder Scrolls V - Skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\DVd\"
         Delete folder \"...\\The Elder Scrolls V - Skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\DVd\"

PS: it\'s my first mod...

___________________________

Update:
New 1.1.1 version.

--- now all stockings in Zlushka\'s Chest in Riverwood (see location screens) - not in barrel :-)
--- change slots for stockings (used \"60-unnamed\" slot) - now you can use boots and stockings at the same time. Also work with wings (see test screen with boots+stockings+wings)
--- delete feet meshes from .nif files
--- change properties of items (weight, armor rating....)

_________
Just for fun )

[media]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mkis913Y6RY[/media]
author: DVd
